sentences.sContent: Have a pencil and notepad ready.
As the words begin to flow, the ideas will come from the shadows and let themselves be captured on your notepad or your screen.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the words begin to flow, the ideas will come from the shadows and let themselves be captured on your notepad or your screen.
sentences.sCn: 当语言开始流畅，想法就会从阴暗处涌现出来，呈现在你的笔记本或者电脑屏幕上。

sentences.sContent: As the words begin to flow, the ideas will come out from the shadows and let themselves be captured on your notepad or your screen.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the words begin to flow, the ideas will come out from the shadows and let themselves be captured on your notepad or your screen.
sentences.sCn: 随着话语开始流淌，思想也会逐渐明朗化，使自己呈现在你的笔记本或者屏幕上。

trans.tranOther: a group of sheets of paper fastened together, used for writing notes
